page.title: 14Prestbury Railway Station.
page.content: The electrified railway line,from London to Manchester,passes through Macclesfield and Prestbury.The railway runs alongside the River Bollin on its route from Macclesfild to Prestbury. Prestbury Station is quite small, mainly used by commuters working in Manchester. However,it has been badly vandalised in recent months.Prestbury Amenities Society hope to restore the station to good condition and working order with help from British Rail,as well.The Society hope that it will help win back the Best Village award for Prestbury. The restored station will have open fronted waiting areas with seats and a heated waiting room. Hopefully,there will be no more complaints about Prestbury's railway station being vandalised.
